settings.title: Decor that is inspired by global culture, and curated by IKIRU
settings.text:
IKIRU, is a beautiful Japanese word, which means “To live”. We believe in
bringing together only the smartest and minimalist designs from selected brands.
Our themes are based on inspiration we draw from different cultures in the world.
We aim to make every space look aesthetic, and offer our customers the decor
that makes a noticeable difference in their lifestyles.

settings.title: Online shopping for Wooden Furniture, Home Decor, and Designer Lights with IKIRU
settings.text: "Discover the Best in Modern and Classic Furniture at Our Online curated home decor Store”
settings.radmore_content:
Welcome to IKIRU, an online curated home decor and furniture store! We offer a wide range of stylish and high-quality furniture products online to help you transform your space into the home of your dreams. we are a theme based home décor platform with more than 9+themes. Our mission is to add up to the lifestyle of everyone with our thoughtfully curated décor collection.

Along with the newest and most distinctive designs of our home decorating lights, each piece of our furniture is masterfully crafted and showcases a variety of unique trends that perfectly match your home décor. We have something for every taste and budget, our major categories includes furniture ,lighting, decor, kitchen, soft furnishing, bath and laundry ,and kids home decor. You may browse our user-friendly website to find the finest options for your home.

We offer multiple payment options and ensure fast, safe delivery when you buy furniture online and designer lights from IKIRU. We also have a reliable return and exchange policy.

One of the Top-Notch Online Furniture Stores in India:

At IKIRU, you'll find a wide selection of high-quality and stylish wooden furniture to elevate your style with our furniture.

To enhance the beauty of your house, we strive to deliver quality goods and one-of-a-kind things. Browse through one of India’s premium online furniture stores and buy furniture online to bring the best beauty to your home with our exclusive range of furniture designs.

Best online wooden furniture store in India

"There is nothing like staying at home for real comfort"

Our online furniture store selection includes everything from modern and contemporary pieces to classic and traditional styles. We have wooden furniture, including comfortable Sofas and Seats, stylish Dining tables and chairs, and functional storage options like Wallshelves and Dressers, Cabinets, TV units.

Experience the comfort and quality of furniture online from IKIRU’s major furniture categories

TV Units: IKIRU offer a wide range of TV units in different styles, materials, and sizes, making it easy to find a unit that fits your needs and budget. Buying furniture online with IKIRU can be a convenient and cost-effective way to furnish your home.

IKIRU offers a wide range of Seating options, including Sofas Chairs, and Benches, in different styles, materials, and sizes, making it easy to find seating that fits your needs and budget. Buy some of our most attractive and elegant seating like Stool, Bench, Ottoman, Poufs, Chairs to sink into comfort.

Cabinets : They are more than just practical storage solutions - they can also be a beautiful and stylish addition to any room. If you are looking to buy cabinet online you can checkout our sideboards, highboards, chest of drawers, buffet ,almira etc at IKIRU.

Wall shelves : They are a practical and stylish storage option for any room. They can be used to display a variety of items and can also be used in commercial settings. You can easily find Wall Shelves at our online wooden furniture store.

Table: A table is more than just a piece of furniture – it's a canvas for creativity. IKIRU has wide range of Center table, Coffee table, Side table, Dressing table, Nest of tables, Study table , Console table made from high quality wood. Whether you're hosting a dinner party, setting up a workspace, or simply looking to add some flair to your home, a table is the perfect blank slate to showcase your style and imagination.

Sofa : Sofa set is a statement, a declaration of your own style and taste. And being an online home decor platform, we curate exclusive and exotic designs from the best in industry manufacturers. Whether you need couch, sectional sofa, low seating sofa, single sofa, 2-seater sofa, 3- seater sofa, IKIRU offers best quality sofa for all your need.

Beds: As one of the leading online store we design king size beds, queen size beds, single bed that comforts you and your family too.
online home decor store , and try out our beds for yourself. We're confident you'll fall in love with one of our beautiful, comfortable, and restful creations.

Dining Furniture: Shopping for Dining furniture has never been easier - or more enjoyable. So why wait? Start building your dream dining room today with IKIRU, all from the comfort of your own home. With just a few clicks, you can explore tables in every size, shape, and finish, from rustic farmhouse to sleek and modern.

Chairs: No matter their size or style, we have Chairs that serve a purpose for all of us. IKIRU provides Arm chair, Office chair, Café chair, Garden chair, Lounge chair, Dining chair, Accent chair, you can buy chair online at ease without disturbing your comfort with IKIRU.

Bookshelf: Bring in an artistic bookshelf from IKIRU by opting for online bookshelf shopping and store all your books in it while organizing your living room décor idea in a more splendiferous way.

Brighten up your home with Best Home Decoration and Designer Lights Online Store:

"Lighting that set the stage and creates the mood"

Don't forget to check out our designer lighting options as well. We have a variety of styles to choose from, including statement Chandeliers, modern Pendant lights, and classic Table lamps. We know how to light up a gloomy room with chic Designer lights.

Buy the most value for money Decorative lights at IKIRU:

Ceiling lights |Wall lights | Table lights | Chandelier | Bathroom lights

Home Décors to Impress:

Decor:

Home decor is all about personalizing and enhancing the spaces where you live and work. It can include everything from paint colors and furniture to accessories and artwork, and can range from sleek and modern to cozy and traditional. IKIRU provides you reasonable home decor products for your all time needs.

Wall art | Mirror | Planters |Plant stand | Soft furnishing

Soft furnishing is the cherry on top of a well-decorated home, adding a touch of comfort and warmth to any space. From fluffy throw blankets to plush pillows and cozy rugs, these pieces bring a sense of luxury and relaxation to a room. Our range of soft furnishing products include:

Rugs and Carpets | Cushion and Cushion Covers | Bedsheets | Duvets covers | Dohars | Throws | Quilts

THEME BASED STORE

We curate products based on theme and bring you the most stylish and innovative home decor collection. We are currently having 10 themes in our home decor selection. Here are some major themes available at IKIRU:

Modern theme | Art deco theme | Japandi | Earthy | Indian | Scandinavian | Moroccan | Bohemian | Coastal | Rustic

KIDS home decor essentials:

We offer furniture to fit every age and taste, whether you're searching for items for a nursery, toddler's room, or a teen's bedroom. We provide a one-stop shop for your home while also offering high-quality items as a one-stop online home furnishings store. Allow us to assist you in designing the ideal area for your children!

Kids furniture | Kids decor| Kids storage and organisers | Kids furnishing

IKIRU, your one stop solution for furniture, lighting and home decor

We focus on unique, multifunctional products, that are built with high-quality craftsmanship, adding value to your home, and inspired by minimalism.

The theme-based concept of our website is what makes us stand out from the crowd. We currently have 10 different themes on our website including Japandi, Indian, Modern, Rustic, Earthy, Art Deco, Moroccan, coastal, and Bohemian.

Ikiru is a one-stop shop for an excellent buying experience due to the simplicity of ordering, the availability of different payment methods, the user-friendly design, and search customisation. Numerous décor options are available for you to browse. You can find items for every taste here, whether your home is designed in a modern or traditional Indian style.

Every time you explore our online home decor shop, you will find distinctive goods thanks to our collaboration with skilled artisans and designers. We provide premium brands that will transform your house into a lovely place to live in.

Explore our curated catalogue

Sofas | Beds| Dining | TV Unit| Rugs and Carpets | Seating | Coffee Tables| Cabinets | Wall Shelves | Bookshelves | Shoe racks | Décor | Bath and Laundry | Kids | Planters and Plant stands | Soft Furnishing | Kitchen | Lighting
